summary: ScaledEnvelop is an envelope which can be scaled to any range

ports.name: Attack
ports.text: The attack time is the amount of time it takes for the envelope to reach it's maximum value

ports.name: Decay
ports.text: After the attack portion of the envelope, the value will fall over the duration of the decay time to it's sustain value

ports.name: Sustain
ports.text: The sustain value is the value which the envelope rests at after triggerAttack is called, but before triggerRelease is invoked

ports.name: Release
ports.text: After triggerRelease is called, the envelope's value will fall to it's miminum value over the duration of the release time

ports.name: Min
ports.text: The envelope's min output value. This is the value which it starts at and where it will end

ports.name: Max
ports.text: The envelope's max output value. In other words, the value at the peak of the attack portion of the envelope
